title: K-Edu
description: This is a e-learning site developed for the Klaytn blockchain ecosystem. The site aims to help users fully understand the ecosystem and how to go about using applications built on the ecosystem. It functionalities includes: wallet connection, course filter/searching, and responsiveness.

title: Analytic Dashboard
description: This is a website that diplays analysis. It functionalities includes: different site theme(light and dark), sidebar, responsiveness, etc.

title: Udemy Clone
description: This was my final project at a bootcamp. It was a group project that required us to clone the landing page of the udemy website.

title: Playmo
description: This happens to be my final group project in the Alx SE program. It functionalities includes: spotify integration, accessibity, and responsiveness

title: Intro Section with dropdown navigation

title: Social Proof Section
description: This is also a frontend mentor project, it a landing page built to practice site resonsiveness and layout.
